name: Ball Drop vs Rings
description:
Ball Drop into the ring to open the gate and move!

Ball drop is created for all those who are lover and curious about ball games entring you into the new era of Neo style games.

Tap on screen to let the ball bounce into the air and manage to drop it into the ring so that you can move further as the only way to open the gate next to ring is to pass into the ring.

The game will be running in a speed which will be increased by the time but while ball in jumping you will be able to move ball upward and so the speed will be controlled. It means ball controls the speed to some extent. Means you can force speed to slow down when you are jumping hard.

 - Avoid the red obstacles if ball drops onto the red or touches them you will see ball blast and smashed. Ultimately the game will be over.
 - At some places you get twin balls even three balls, if any of them dies the rest will not and game will be running for as long as last ball is alive.
 - Get ghost bonuses and get more score.
 - Collect the free coins.
 - Secure the high score and challenge your friends.

Good luck...!

For Amazon etc. add following line:

When it comes to Ball Dropping Games here is the best drop the ball game in which you will have to control the ball and let ball jump and pass it into the ring if it touches reds the ball b blast occurs.

What is game about: ball drop, ball games, ball jump, ball smasher, ball jump games, ball bounce, ball games free, ball dropping games, drop the ball game, ball control, ball blast
